attributes.action: ensure MP's declare their position in the expenses scandal at the time of the next general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To ensure that the electorate are aware of the honesty of their member of parliment at the next election, we request the Prime Minster to ensure that all MP's are required to declare their position in the current expenses scandal at the time of the next general election.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
